_157239n

Class SimpleProgressThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • _157239n.SimpleProgressThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProgressThread

    public class SimpleProgressThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Represents a simple progress thread.

    This class is intended for very simple progress tracking. You can initialize a new progress, modify and get the progress in the meanwhile. The progress itself is stored inside a _Float object so that the progress object can be used to attach to other methods wishing to control and manage the object.

    Because this class extends Thread, you can specify the Thread.run() method to carry out your job and manage it on the fly.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    157239n, www.157239n.com
